cnbc.summary: Trump accused BLS Commissioner Erika McEntarfer of being a political appointee who was manipulating jobs data.

cnbc.summary: Her resignation now paves the way for Trump to put his own nominee in for the Board of Governors.

cnbc.title: Tesla must pay portion of $329 million in damages after fatal Autopilot crash, jury says
cnbc.summary: A jury in Florida determined that Tesla should be held partly liable for a fatal 2019 crash involving its Autopilot technology.

cnbc.title: Trump says he moved two nuclear submarines after Russia's Medvedev warns U.S.
cnbc.summary: Dmitry Medvedev said President Trump is "playing the ultimatum game with Russia" in pressuring for an end to the war on Ukraine.

cnbc.title: Google has dropped more than 50 DEI-related organizations from one of its funding lists
cnbc.summary: The dropped groups had mission statements that included the words "diversity, "equity," "inclusion," or "race," "activism," and "women."

cnbc.summary: President Donald Trump and the Justice Department face criticism for not releasing information about the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.
